Post.title: Hello World
Post._content:
Welcome to [Hexo](https://hexo.io/)! This is your very first post. Check [documentation](https://hexo.io/docs/) for more info. If you get any problems when using Hexo, you can find the answer in [troubleshooting](https://hexo.io/docs/troubleshooting.html) or you can ask me on [GitHub](https://github.com/hexojs/hexo/issues).

## Quick Start

### Create a new post

``` bash
$ hexo new "My New Post"
```

More info: [Writing](https://hexo.io/docs/writing.html)

### Run server

``` bash
$ hexo server
```

More info: [Server](https://hexo.io/docs/server.html)

### Generate static files

``` bash
$ hexo generate
```

More info: [Generating](https://hexo.io/docs/generating.html)

### Deploy to remote sites

``` bash
$ hexo deploy
```

More info: [Deployment](https://hexo.io/docs/one-command-deployment.html)

# D-Link with Game Glitch

: 
: July 25, 2022
: 2
: 
: Yes
: https://ac.nowcoder.com/acm/contest/33187/D

## 

+SPFA

Karp

## 



$i$: $a_i$ $b_i$,$c_i$$d_i$

$$
a_i\times b_i\to c_i \times d_i 
$$

$i$: $\frac{a_i}{c_i}$ $b_i$,$1$$d_i$

$$
\frac{a_i}{c_i}\times b_i \to d_i
$$

$k$

$$
\prod_{i}^k\frac{a_i}{c_i} \to 
$$

$k$, , 

$$
\prod_{i}^k\frac{a_i}{c_i} \to 
$$

$n$, $m$, $\frac{a_i}{c_i}$, 

$x$, $\frac {x}{\prod_{i}^k\frac{a_i}{c_i}}$,

, $x\frac {x}{\prod_{i}^k\frac{a_i}{c_i}}$, 

$$
\prod_{i}^k\frac{a_i}{c_i}1
$$

$w$

$$
a_i\times b_i\to w\times c_i \times d_i 
$$



$$
\frac{a_i}{wc_i}\times b_i \to d_i
$$



$$
\prod_{i}^k\frac{a_i}{wc_i} \to 
$$

$w$

$$
\frac1{w^k}\prod_{i}^k\frac{a_i}{c_i} \to 
$$



$n$, $m$, $\frac{a_i}{wc_i}$, 

$x$, $\frac {x}{\frac1{w^k}\prod_{i}^k\frac{a_i}{c_i}}$,

, $x\frac {x}{\frac1{w^k}\prod_{i}^k\frac{a_i}{c_i}}$, 

$$
\prod_{i}^k\frac{a_i}{c_i}w^k
$$

$\prod_{i}^k\frac{a_i}{c_i}$, ,

$$
\min(\prod_{i}^k\frac{a_i}{c_i})w^k
$$

$w$, 

$$
\min(\prod_{i}^k\frac{a_i}{c_i})=w^k
$$



$$
w=\min\left(\sqrt[k]{\prod_{i}^k\frac{a_i}{c_i}}\right)
$$



$$
\ln(\prod_{i}^k\frac{a_i}{c_i})=\sum_i^k\ln(\frac{a_i}{c_i})
$$



$$
\prod_{i}^k\frac{a_i}{c_i}=e^{\sum_i^k\ln(\frac{a_i}{c_i})}
$$



$$
w^k=e^{\min(\sum_i^k\ln(\frac{a_i}{c_i}))}
$$



$$
w=\min(\sqrt[k]{e^{\sum_i^k\ln(\frac{a_i}{c_i})}})
$$

$$
w=\exp\left(\min(\frac{\sum_i^k\ln(\frac{a_i}{c_i})}{k})\right)
$$



$\ln(\frac{a_i}{c_i})$$G(V,E)$

$Karp$

$F[k][v]$,$k$$v$, $u\to v$ 

$$
F[k][v]=\min_{e\in E}\{F[k-1][u]+w[u][v]\}
$$

$$
ans = \min_{v\in V}\{\max_{0kn-1}\{\frac{F[n][v]-F[k][v]}{n-k}\}\}
$$

### 

****[](https://blog.csdn.net/qq_30361651/article/details/107801468)****

## 

```cpp
#include<bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;
const int maxn = 2005;
int n,m,b,d;
double a,c,ans;
double dp[maxn][maxn];
struct edge {
    int u;
    int v;
    double w;
};
vector<edge> edges;
int main(){
    cin>>n>>m;
    for(int i=1;i<=m;i++){
        cin>>a>>b>>c>>d;
        edges.push_back({b,d,log(a/c)});
    }
    for (int i=1;i<=n;i++) {
        for (auto [u,v,w] : edges) {
            dp[i][v] = min(dp[i][v],dp[i-1][u]+w);
        }
    }
    for(int v=1;v<=n;v++){
        double t = -INFINITY;
        for(int k=0;k<n;k++){
            t = max(t,(dp[n][v]-dp[k][v])/(n-k));
        }
        ans = min(t,ans);
    }
    printf("%.15lf\n",exp(ans));
    return 0;
}
```

D-Link with Game Glitch

+SPFA

Karp

\(i\): \(a_i\) \(b_i\),\(c_i\)\(d_i\)

\[ a_i\times b_i\to c_i \times d_i \]

\(i\): \(\frac{a_i}{c_i}\) \(b_i\),\(1\)\(d_i\)

\[ \frac{a_i}{c_i}\times b_i \to d_i \]

\(k\)

\[ \prod_{i}^k\frac{a_i}{c_i} \to \]

\(k\), ,

\[ \prod_{i}^k\frac{a_i}{c_i} \to \]

\(n\), \(m\), \(\frac{a_i}{c_i}\),

\(x\), \(\frac {x}{\prod_{i}^k\frac{a_i}{c_i}}\),

, \(x\frac {x}{\prod_{i}^k\frac{a_i}{c_i}}\),

\[ \prod_{i}^k\frac{a_i}{c_i}1 \]

\(w\)

\[ a_i\times b_i\to w\times c_i \times d_i \]

\[ \frac{a_i}{wc_i}\times b_i \to d_i \]

\[ \prod_{i}^k\frac{a_i}{wc_i} \to \]

\(w\)

\[ \frac1{w^k}\prod_{i}^k\frac{a_i}{c_i} \to \]

\(n\), \(m\), \(\frac{a_i}{wc_i}\),

\(x\), \(\frac {x}{\frac1{w^k}\prod_{i}^k\frac{a_i}{c_i}}\),

, \(x\frac {x}{\frac1{w^k}\prod_{i}^k\frac{a_i}{c_i}}\),

\[ \prod_{i}^k\frac{a_i}{c_i}w^k \]

\(\prod_{i}^k\frac{a_i}{c_i}\), ,

\[ \min(\prod_{i}^k\frac{a_i}{c_i})w^k \]

\(w\),

\[ \min(\prod_{i}^k\frac{a_i}{c_i})=w^k \]

\[ w=\min\left(\sqrt[k]{\prod_{i}^k\frac{a_i}{c_i}}\right) \]

\[ \ln(\prod_{i}^k\frac{a_i}{c_i})=\sum_i^k\ln(\frac{a_i}{c_i}) \]

\[ \prod_{i}^k\frac{a_i}{c_i}=e^{\sum_i^k\ln(\frac{a_i}{c_i})} \]

\[ w^k=e^{\min(\sum_i^k\ln(\frac{a_i}{c_i}))} \]

\[ w=\min(\sqrt[k]{e^{\sum_i^k\ln(\frac{a_i}{c_i})}}) \]

\[ w=\exp\left(\min(\frac{\sum_i^k\ln(\frac{a_i}{c_i})}{k})\right) \]

\(\ln(\frac{a_i}{c_i})\)\(G(V,E)\)

\(Karp\)

\(F[k][v]\),\(k\)\(v\), \(u\to v\)

\[ F[k][v]=\min_{e\in E}\{F[k-1][u]+w[u][v]\} \]

\[ ans = \min_{v\in V}\{\max_{0kn-1}\{\frac{F[n][v]-F[k][v]}{n-k}\}\} \]

\(13\),\(13-j\),\(j\)

\(j=0\),

,, \(0\)

\[ \begin{align} f[i][0]=0 \end{align} \]

\(j=1\),

\(i-1\),

,\(j-1\),

,\(j\)

\[ \begin{align} f[i][j]&=1\\ &+\frac{3*j}{i}*f[i-1][j-1]&\\ &+\frac{i-3*j}{i}*f[i-1][j]& \end{align} \]

\(f[i][j]\)
